name: Smoke Suite
description: Fast benchmark with ~10 highest-signal tests for quick iteration. Covers the key differentiators where plugin impact is measurable. Target runtime: ~15 minutes.
selection_criteria: Tests where plugin shows clear improvement (eval, rm-rf, plan-only detection)
Tests where regressions occur (debugging, test generation, config templates)
Tests where both miss (XSS, eval in security context)
At least 2 tests per major category for coverage
